titleStmt.title: Truth vindicated, against sacriledge, atheism, and prophaneness and likewise against the common invaders of the rights of Kings, and demonstrating the vanity of man in general. By Gryffith Williams now Lord Bishop of Ossory.
titleStmt.author: Williams, Gryffith, 1589?-1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Randall Taylor at the Three Crowns in Little-Britain, and in Westminster-Hall,

notesStmt.note: With an initial imprimatur leaf signed: Geo: Stradling; and dated: 30. Jun. 1662.; imprimatur leaf is A1v.
With marginal notes, tables of contents, and "To the King's most excellent Majesty" preface's throughout.

"Psal. 39.5." has caption title, separate pagination, register beginning with 4A, and running title: The vanitie of everie man.
